title: Effort to Set Vote to Form Northern Ireland Government Hits a Snag
description: Britain’s Northern Ireland secretary had been expected to announce on Friday that a new election would be held in December. But a British official failed to set a day for the vote.
dc:creator: Mark Landler
media:description: A polling station in May in Belfast, Northern Ireland. Sinn Fein’s victory that month was a watershed in the country’s politics.
